title.narrative: SUPPORTIVE & CARING ENVIRONMENT

description.narrative: PRIORITY: PROTECTING: for every child, a Supportive and Caring Environment, which contributes to Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

KETHI RESEARCH CENTER FOR GENDER EQUALITY
TERRE DES HOMMES HELLAS GI TON ANTH
TRUSTEES OF COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY IN THE CITY OF NEW YORK

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: PRIORITY: PROTECTING: for every child, a Supportive and Caring Environment

description.narrative: In 2021, UNICEF in partnership with local NGO partners and national stakeholders supported the following:Delivery of child protection and GBV prevention/mitigation and response services across GreeceEnhanced quality of care and systems strengtheningBuilding on its new expanded mandate in Greece, UNICEF also established the foundation for new pillars of work on:childcare systems reform with a focus on strengthening family and community-based care, including foster care, and deinstitutionalizationChild friendly justice and violence against children (incl. Child Online Protection) taking into account how it affects boys and girlsEvidence generation to inform policy making | Status:Partially met | As-of Date:19/01/2022
